TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileRemovedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileRemovedEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ProfileRemovedEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> should no longer be tracked. The tracking service uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> to the runtime tracking infrastructure. For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved?displayProperty=nameWithType> event. After a tracking service raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will no longer associate a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> with the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> for that tracking service.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type workflowType) cil managed

Docs.param: The workflow for which the should be removed.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that applies to the specified workflow .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type>.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ WorkflowType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.WorkflowType : Type with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the workflow for which the should be removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> no longer exists, and which, therefore, should no longer be tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
